summary: Some improvements over the old Konahrik.
descriptionHtml:
I was always unhappy with the Dragon Priest Enchantments. They were supposed to be some of the most powerful items in the game, but with an enchanting skill of 100, a few potions, and a few perks, the player can easily make better items. So I decided to create a mod that would make Konahrik (my favorite mask) better without being overpowered.

Improvements:

+50 Magicka
+50 Health
+50 Stamina
+Slightly increased base armor rating
Improved item description

This is only a minor change and I tested it, so there shouldn't be any problems. However, this is my first mod, so if you find any bugs let me know.
author: TravelerOfTamriel
